content: ***get yourself organized with the practical and cozy jessie stash basket *** these large rectangular baskets are made by holding two strands of super bulky yarn together with a 9mm hook alternate the waistcoat stitch and single_crochet in the back loop for an unexpectedly beautiful texture bet you can t make just one find the free version of the jessie stash basket here 1 pattern includes a full tutorial video **materials** -395 yards wool/acrylic blend 4 balls of lion brand wool-ease thick & quick -9mm crochet hook -scissors -tapestry needle -locking stitch markers **techniques** -working into both sides of a chain -single_crochet increasing -waistcoat stitch -back loop stitching **measurements** one size - 14 wide x 6 deep x 7 tall // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns add all patterns to cart for discount limit one use per purchase 1 http //tlycblog com/jessie-chunky-crochet-basket-pattern
